description:
Proudly presented by Lee Hughes and Brad Schultz Freedom Property Sunshine Coast.

Elevated with views to Mt Ninderry and secluded, offering complete privacy, this property is located in the ever-popular acreage suburb of Ninderry, conveniently located a short drive from Yandina, Eumundi, and Coolum Beach.

The property occupies a manageable 0.98 acres (4002m2), and whilst elevated, the owners have made excellent use of the land with levelled areas consisting of lush established garden beds, lawn spaces, ornamental pathways, and rock walls. The wide variety of fruit trees and the small dam further complement the use of the block, which is ideal for the kids to play, house some chooks/livestock, and reap the rewards of a more sustainable lifestyle by cultivating your garden beds or orchard.

Enjoy the space, privacy, and serenity with native wildlife and birds visiting the gardens whilst taking in the views of Mt Ninderry from the undercover deck.

Constructed on two levels, the lower level includes a single garage, separate bathroom/laundry, and entry door. With a little effort, this level could easily be converted to a fourth bedroom, granny flat/studio, teenager retreat, home office, or even offer some rental income accommodation.

Renovated and extended in 2002, the home offers a spacious open plan living, dining and modern kitchen area enhanced with beautiful timber floors and a floor-to-ceiling wood burner for those cold winter nights. The kitchen has ample cupboard, benchtop space, and a window to act as a servery hatch onto the deck. This entire space is filled with light and has views from every angle and two access points to the expansive undercover deck that wraps around three sides of the upper level.

The three bedrooms, one with an ensuite, are generously sized with built-in robes and ceiling fans, and the two bedrooms share the renovated bathroom and separate toilet.

Entry to the upper level is via a sun room with a polished concrete floor. This room is currently used as an art room and would make the perfect home office space.

This property will suit a wide variety of buyers;
- Those seeking a private acreage lifestyle
- Families with children that want a safe space to explore
- A buyer seeking to conduct some renovation work to convert the lower level into additional accommodation
- Keen gardeners/horticulturists
- Retirees seeking a quiet lifestyle with time to potter in the garden
- Those seeking a property with a second living space for family members, produce a passive income or have a home office/business

Mount Ninderry is on your doorstep with a popular walking track that allows dogs on leads. The Yandina township is a short drive away, offering all amenities and a bustling weekend market. The Bruce Highway provides easy access to other towns such as Eumundi, and Coolum Beach is just 20mins away.

This property is unique and special in many ways and must be inspected. Do not delay; contact Lee or Brad for further details and to arrange an inspection.

- Private acreage close to all amenities
- Extension and renovation completed 2002
- Dam and established lush tropical gardens
- Vermin proof chook pen
- Elevated with views of Mt Ninderry
- Black butt timber floors
- Potential to convert lower level
- Wide, wrap around covered deck

Call Lee or Brad for further details

listers.name: Lee Hughes
listers.job_title: Licensed Real Estate Agent - Sunshine Coast
